skins.selfIntroduction: I'm the Project 38 destroyer, Minsk. I fought in the Great War alongside my sisters! Comrade Commander, expect great things from my inspiration... and my hard work!
skins.acquisition: §µ§â§Ñ! How's that, what'd ya think? Huh? Where I'm from, they said you're supposed to surprise the people you're greeting! What, I'm the one being welcomed?! Sorry, I mixed something up!
skins.login: Comrade Commander, you came at just the right time! I just had a flash of inspiration and came up with a new strategy! Come test it out with me!
skins.details: Heheh~ Comrade Commander, have you come to participate in my new inspired experiment?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Gangut...? Err, I mean, Comrade Gangut? Hmm, she kind of scares me...
skins.secretaryIdle2: My fighting spirit, just like my inspiration, is unbreakable! That's right, I'll stand back up again!
skins.secretaryIdle3: When I mess up, I make sure to apologize profusely! That way, everyone will forgive me... hopefully.
skins.secretaryTouch: Hm? Did you stumble into your own inspiration, Comrade Commander?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Eh...?! Is this revenge for something I did?!

skins.shipDescription: You've violated the Minsk Protocol, comrade! Therefore, the sentence appropriate for you is imprisonment! Until when? Obviously, until your jailor is satisfied~?
skins.acquisition: You've violated the Minsk Protocol, comrade! Therefore, the sentence appropriate for you is imprisonment! Until when? Obviously, until your jailor is satisfied~?
skins.login: Entrust your faith with god, and entrust your body with me! That's right, you're in my jail now!
skins.secretaryIdle1: If you try to escape again, I'll slap more time onto your sentence? Huh? You weren't given a sentence in the first place? Eh, don't sweat the details~
skins.secretaryIdle2: Hehe, you think you can stage a jailbreak? I'd like to see you try, Comrade Commander!
skins.secretaryIdle3: When I'm not patrolling, I'm writing reports... this jailor business is super boring! Hey, one of you prisoners, write the reports for me!
skins.secretaryTouch: Heheh~ Do you want to get tased that badly~?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Congratulations, you've earned yourself a one-way ticket to a Siberian potato-digging trip! Sign right here, and enjoy~!
